title: Trex's Cline on Alternative Decking: Poised For Growth (Audio)
itunes:title: Trex's Cline on Alternative Decking: Poised For Growth (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Jim Cline, CEO of Trex, the biggest alternative decking company in the US, on the impact of the existing home sales market, utilizing recycled materials, and how the industry is poised for growth.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
